testcase.name: api testing "before each" hook: login to the application for "Create and validate article"
testcase.classname: "before each" hook: login to the application for "Create and validate article"

failure.message:
`cy.request()` failed on: http://localhost:4200/undefinedusers/login The response we received from your web server was: > 404: Not Found This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`. If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false` ----------------------------------------------------------- The request we sent was: Method: POST URL: http://localhost:4200/undefinedusers/login Headers: { "Connection": "keep-alive", "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Cypress/6.3.0 Chrome/87.0.4280.141 Electron/11.2.0 Safari/537.36", "accept": "*/*", "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate", "content-type": "application/json", "content-length": 70 } Body: {"user":{"email":"rijuvijayan@gmail.com","password":"testautomation"}} ----------------------------------------------------------- The response we got was: Status: 404 - Not Found Headers: { "x-powered-by": "Express", "access-control-allow-origin": "*", "content-security-policy": "default-src 'none'", "x-content-type-options": "nosniff", "content-type": "text/html; charset=utf-8", "content-length": "160", "date": "Mon, 01 Feb 2021 03:38:43 GMT", "connection": "keep-alive" } Body: Error 
Cannot POST /undefinedusers/login
https://on.cypress.io/request Because this error occurred during a `before each` hook we are skipping the remaining tests in the current suite: `api testing`
